DOC.detailed_description: The RESILIENT Trial dual stage clinical investigation design evaluate safety effectiveness Edwards Lifesciences self-expanding stent system . Phase 1 consists prospective , multi-center , non-randomized study peri-procedure endpoint . Phase 2 consists prospective , multi-center , randomized study 30-day primary safety endpoint 6-month primary effectiveness endpoint .
